mrdrivers 0.7.2
  • Reference

Get information on available scenarios

Source: R/toolGetScenarioDefinition.R
toolGetScenarioDefinition.Rd

toolGetScenarioDefinition can be used to figure out which scenarios are made available by mrdrivers, and how they are constructed, i.e. what xPast, xFuture and xCalib strings are used.

Usage

toolGetScenarioDefinition(driver = NULL, scen = NULL, unlist = FALSE)

Arguments

driver

NULL or a character vector designating the driver for which information is to be returned. If NULL, information for all drivers is returned. Available drivers are "GDP", "Population" and "GDPpc".

scen

NULL or a character vector designating the scenario for which information is to be returned. If NULL, information for all scenarios is returned. Available scenarios are:

  • GDP-scenarios: "SSPs", "SDPs", and "SSP2EU"

  • Populations-scenarios: "SSPs", "SDPs", "SSP2EU" and "ISIMIP"

  • GDPpc-scenarios: "SSPs", "SDPs", and "SSP2EU"

unlist

TRUE or FALSE (default). If TRUE the xCalib, xPast and xFuture entries are returned directly.

Value

A list with the scenarios and their xPast, xFuture and xCalib strings.

Examples

toolGetScenarioDefinition()
#> $GDP
#> # A tibble: 7 × 4
#>   scenario   GDPPast              GDPFuture GDPCalib       
#>   <chr>      <chr>                <chr>     <chr>          
#> 1 SSPsOld    IHME_USD05_PPP_pc-MI SSPs-MI   past_transition
#> 2 SSPs       WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibSSPs      
#> 3 SDPs       WDI-MI               SDPs-MI   calibSDPs      
#> 4 SSP2EU     Eurostat-WDI-MI      SSP2EU-MI calibSSP2EU    
#> 5 noCovid    WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibNoCovid   
#> 6 longCovid  WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibLongCovid 
#> 7 shortCovid WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibShortCovid
#> 
#> $Population
#> # A tibble: 5 × 4
#>   scenario PopulationPast            PopulationFuture    PopulationCalib
#>   <chr>    <chr>                     <chr>               <chr>          
#> 1 SSPs     WDI-UN_PopDiv-MI          SSPs-UN_PopDiv-MI   calibSSPs      
#> 2 SDPs     WDI-UN_PopDiv-MI          SDPs-UN_PopDiv-MI   calibSDPs      
#> 3 SSP2EU   Eurostat-WDI-UN_PopDiv-MI SSP2EU-UN_PopDiv-MI calibSSP2EU    
#> 4 ISIMIP   UN_PopDiv-MI              SSPs-UN_PopDiv-MI   calibISIMIP    
#> 5 SSPsOld  WDI-MI                    SSPs_old-MI         past_transition
#> 
#> $GDPpc
#> # A tibble: 6 × 4
#>   scenario   GDPpcPast       GDPpcFuture GDPpcCalib     
#>   <chr>      <chr>           <chr>       <chr>          
#> 1 SSPs       WDI-MI          SSPs-MI     calibSSPs      
#> 2 SDPs       WDI-MI          SDPs-MI     calibSDPs      
#> 3 SSP2EU     Eurostat-WDI-MI SSP2EU-MI   calibSSP2EU    
#> 4 noCovid    WDI-MI          SSPs-MI     calibNoCovid   
#> 5 longCovid  WDI-MI          SSPs-MI     calibLongCovid 
#> 6 shortCovid WDI-MI          SSPs-MI     calibShortCovid
#> 
toolGetScenarioDefinition(driver = "GDP")
#> $GDP
#> # A tibble: 7 × 4
#>   scenario   GDPPast              GDPFuture GDPCalib       
#>   <chr>      <chr>                <chr>     <chr>          
#> 1 SSPsOld    IHME_USD05_PPP_pc-MI SSPs-MI   past_transition
#> 2 SSPs       WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibSSPs      
#> 3 SDPs       WDI-MI               SDPs-MI   calibSDPs      
#> 4 SSP2EU     Eurostat-WDI-MI      SSP2EU-MI calibSSP2EU    
#> 5 noCovid    WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibNoCovid   
#> 6 longCovid  WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibLongCovid 
#> 7 shortCovid WDI-MI               SSPs-MI   calibShortCovid
#> 
toolGetScenarioDefinition(scen = "SSP2EU")
#> $GDP
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   scenario GDPPast         GDPFuture GDPCalib   
#>   <chr>    <chr>           <chr>     <chr>      
#> 1 SSP2EU   Eurostat-WDI-MI SSP2EU-MI calibSSP2EU
#> 
#> $Population
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   scenario PopulationPast            PopulationFuture    PopulationCalib
#>   <chr>    <chr>                     <chr>               <chr>          
#> 1 SSP2EU   Eurostat-WDI-UN_PopDiv-MI SSP2EU-UN_PopDiv-MI calibSSP2EU    
#> 
#> $GDPpc
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   scenario GDPpcPast       GDPpcFuture GDPpcCalib 
#>   <chr>    <chr>           <chr>       <chr>      
#> 1 SSP2EU   Eurostat-WDI-MI SSP2EU-MI   calibSSP2EU
#> 
toolGetScenarioDefinition(driver = "Population", scen = "SSPs", unlist = TRUE)
#> $PopulationPast
#> [1] "WDI-UN_PopDiv-MI"
#> 
#> $PopulationFuture
#> [1] "SSPs-UN_PopDiv-MI"
#> 
#> $PopulationCalib
#> [1] "calibSSPs"
#>
